title: Are the Belift female auditions for I-land season 2 or for a new girl group? Or both? Is there even going to be a new girl group? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m sure it is for both. If there is to be a new girl group, and I-LAND female ver is for that specifically, then trainees will be chosen for that purpose. If you want to audition for Be:lift then I suggest you do it now, because the auditions are for a certain time.
